name: 痩身犬(休眠)
description: Your very own undead servant.  The blob controlling its body is in a state of coma, awaiting your orders.  Use this item to wake up the minion.

use_action.hostile_msg: Something has gone wrong; after getting up the zombie lumbers toward you menacingly!
use_action.friendly_msg: The zombie climbs to its feet and shambles around.
